title: Gideon66
author: Gideon66
content: I will say Bitcoin is more significant. It's considered because many Bitcoin miner today are using renewable energy sources like wind power, that give more impact on our environment. Bitcoin will be more efficient and suitable option. Important notice Bitcoin uses around 0.1-0.3% of global energy absorbing.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Stop spamming.Quote from: Charles-Tim on November 02, 2023, 09:35:19 PMAll your posts today were all topics:Best way to invest in Bitcoin. Posted today at 06:18:38 PMHow is Bitcoin ATM machine help in most countries. Posted today at 08:23:08 PMBitcoin fraudulent activities in Nigeria. Posted today at 09:03:36 PMFew tips for beginners on Bitcoin thread. Posted today at 09:10:42 PMWhy do you prefer Bitcoin as a method of payment? Posted today at 09:23:15 PMIn short words, this has turned to spamming.

comments.author: Mr.right85
comments.body: Quote from: Charles-Tim on November 02, 2023, 09:40:52 PMStop spamming.Quote from: Charles-Tim on November 02, 2023, 09:35:19 PMAll your posts today were all topics:Best way to invest in Bitcoin. Posted today at 06:18:38 PMHow is Bitcoin ATM machine help in most countries. Posted today at 08:23:08 PMBitcoin fraudulent activities in Nigeria. Posted today at 09:03:36 PMFew tips for beginners on Bitcoin thread. Posted today at 09:10:42 PMWhy do you prefer Bitcoin as a method of payment? Posted today at 09:23:15 PMIn short words, this has turned to spamming.No be small tin o,Na exactly watin I bin wan tell am too b dis. I no know if e know bt, dem no Dey do somtin lik dat. Na discussion forum b dis nd as such, I go talk, wait 4 response nd dem I contribute based on d response. Na so dem Dey talk’ talk.How can person go just carry thread full everywhere! Dey create thread in minutes.Abeg, if I dey see dis thing, try use d search button rather than to dey create thread anyhow. Dis no b 2 fight  up, na jst 2 bring 2 ur notice say, e no good. Dis corner na we all get am, make we try dey keep an clean nd used in a way wey be say, e go sweet pple way dey follow us watch for eye.Stop spamming with threads!
